```{r Validation rule 5: "The admission event is not completed"}

problems <- problems |>
  bind_rows(
    patients |>
      inner_join(enrollments, join_by(key == patient)) |>
      filter(admission_status != 'COMPLETED') |>
      mutate(
        EVENT_ID = admission_event,
        EVENT_TYPE = event_types("ADM"),
        EVENT_DATE = admission_occurredAt,
        PROBLEM_ID = 5L,
        ADMISSION_STATUS = admission_status,
        .keep = "unused") |>
      select(
        SITE_CODE,
        DEPARTMENT_NAME,
        DEPARTMENT_OU,
        NEOIPC_PATIENT_ID,
        PATIENT_TEI,
        ENROLMENT_ID,
        ENROLMENT_DATE,
        EVENT_ID,
        EVENT_TYPE,
        EVENT_DATE,
        PROBLEM_ID,
        ADMISSION_STATUS
        ))
```
